name: There are no zombies
description:
The zombie apocalypse has begun, so you begin on a quest to prove that the zombies are all just a government conspiracy! Don't worry, you did you own research, so you can't possibly be wrong. Bash your way through "Regular friendly people" on your way to prove that the zombies don't exist!

Made in 2 days for a personal challenge I had for myself.

This game is still in development, I might expand on it if enough people play it! So if you like the game, share it with your friends!

Controls

Arrow Keys: Move

Up Key: Jump

Space Key: Bash zombies with your thick skull.
